title: Paula DeanPound Cake
steps: 1. preheat oven to 350 deg f
in mixer cream butter and shortening
add eggs one at a time
stir dry ingredients in a separate bowl
add dry ingredients and milk alternately to mixer
start and end with flour
add vanilla
pour into greased tube pan
bake for 65-95 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean from middle

title: Cherry Pineapple Dump Cake
steps: 1. Preheat oven to 350
2. Dump cherry pie filling and crushed pineapple into 13 x 9 baking dish stir together
3. Sprinkle cake mix over top of fruit
4. Slice butter sticks into small chunks and distribute evenly over top of cake mix on top of fruit
5. Bake until top is brown and bubbly (45 minutes to an hour)
6. serve with whipped cream

title: Whipped Pie
steps: 1. put pie shell on counter
2. fill with cans of whipped cream
3. eat / throw at face of frenemy

title: Chocolate Pie
items: 3 cups heavy cream (just over a quart)
steps: 1. pre bake pie crust if not ready to go out of package
2. In a double broiler or in a small pot on low heat, add 1/3 cup heavy cream and 3/4 cup semi sweet chocolate chips. Stir frequently until melted and smooth.
3. Pour chocolate mixture into baked pie crust and freeze for 20 minutes

4. While pie is in the freezer, in same chocolate pan add 1/2 cup of heavy cream & 3/4 cup semi sweet chocolate chips. Mix frequently until chocolate is melted and smooth. Allow to cool to room temperature. If in a hurry, pop into the fridge to cool quickly.
5. In a separate bowl, beat 1 cup of heavy cream and vanilla until soft peaks form.
6. Add cooled chocolate mixture to heavy cream and continue beating until thick, creamy and soft peaks form.
7. Pour this second chocolate layer into pie crust and return to freezer for 20 more minutes.
8. In another bowl mix 1 cup heavy cream with 1/4 cup powdered sugar. until stiff peaks form. Spread over Chocolate pie.
9. Shave / grate hershey bar on top of pie
10. Serve immediately or return to freezer. (if frozen thaw 1 hour before serving)

title: Hay Stax
steps: 1. melt down chips in large non stick skillet over med/low heat
2. when melted reduce heat to low and stir in peanut butter
3. remove from heat and fold  in noodles
4. stir in marshmallows
5. Scoop spoonfuls onto wax paper to dry
6. Let stand 1 hour
